title: I Think All Men Are Gay!
description: Enter the world of Paranoia, and meet Vanessa a sarcastic and sometimes insanely psychotic woman that since a few events during her teen hood has come to the conclusion that ALL men are gay. Not just some men, but all and in some cases in her scattered brain women as well. In this controversial topic read through the events and sometimes delusional thoughts that has led Vanessa to her conclusion on sexuality and the human species as a whole.
author: Jewc Burger
